admin/sheets-catalog-import.title: Google Catalog Import
admin/sheets-catalog-import.setup.title: Setup
admin/sheets-catalog-import.setup.descri: Please click the button below to grant this app access to your Google Drive.
admin/sheets-catalog-import.connected.te: Your Google account has been connected
admin/sheets-catalog-import.sheet-import: No product entries to be imported.
{done, plural, one {# product} other {# products}} imported.
{errors, plural, one {# product wasn't} other {# products weren't}} imported. Please, try again.
It wasn't possible to import the products. Please, try again.
admin/sheets-catalog-import.add-images.d: Add Image Links to Images Tab
admin/sheets-catalog-import.add-images.t: This feature only works if you are also using the VTEX Google Drive App, which creates a folder in your drive. You can use the folder titled NEW to add product images. These images will be prepopulated in your Google Catalog Import spreadsheet.
